mapper.insert: insert into approval_doc (org_user_id, grade_name, position_name, form_code, approval_doc_title, contents, created_at, approval_count, doc_status, enforcement_date, doc_del_status, seq_code, approval_date) values (#{orgUserId}, #{gradeName}, #{positionName}, #{formCode}, #{approvalDocTitle}, #{contents}, #{createdAt}, #{approvalCount}, #{docStatus}, #{enforcementDate}, 0, #{seqCode}, #{approvalDate});
insert into received_ref (category, use_id, approval_doc_id) values( #{category}, #{id}, #{approvalDocId});
insert into approval_doc (product_num) values(#{productNum}) where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId};
mapper.select: select approval_id, approval_doc_id, receive_date, approval_date, approval_order, approval_status, org_user_id from approval where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId} and org_user_id = #{orgUserId};
select approval_id, org_user_id from approval where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId} and approval_order = #{approvalOrder}+1;
select org_user_id from approval_doc where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId};
mapper.update: update received_ref set active_state = 1 where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId};
mapper.select: select org_user_id from approval where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId} and approval_order < #{approvalOrder};

select approval_doc_id, t1.org_user_id, t3.user_name, t5.dept_name, approval_date, approval_doc_title, contents, enforcement_date, product_num, t1.form_code, t4.default_form from approval_doc t1 left join organization_user t2 on t1.org_user_id = t2.org_user_id left join user t3 on t2.user_id = t3.user_id left join form t4 on t1.form_code = t4.form_code left join department t5 on t2.dept_id = t5.dept_id where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId} and doc_del_status = 0;

select t1.org_user_id, user_name, approval_order, approval_status from approval t1 left join organization_user t2 on t1.org_user_id = t2.org_user_id left join user t3 on t2.user_id = t3.user_id where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId};

select t1.category , t2.comp_id as org_user_id ,comp_name as user from received_ref t1 inner join company t2 on t1.use_id = t2.comp_id where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId} and category = 'C' union select t1.category , t2.est_id as org_user_id ,est_name as user from received_ref t1 inner join establishment t2 on t1.use_id = t2.est_id where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId} and category = 'E' union select t1.category , t2.dept_id as org_user_id ,dept_name as user from received_ref t1 inner join department t2 on t1.use_id = t2.dept_id where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId} and category = 'D' union select t1.category ,t2.user_id as org_user_id , user_name as user from received_ref t1 inner join organization_user t2 on t1.use_id = t2.user_id inner join user t3 on t2.user_id = t3.user_id where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId} and category = 'U';

select org_user_id from received_ref t1 join organization_user t2 on t1.use_id = t2.org_user_id where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId} and category = 'U' and active_state = 1 union select distinct org_user_id from organization_user where dept_id = (select dept_id from received_ref t1 join department t2 on t1.use_id = t2.dept_id where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId} and category = 'D' and active_state = 1) or comp_name = ( select comp_name from received_ref t1 join company t2 on t1.use_id = t2.comp_id where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId} and category = 'C' and active_state = 1) or est_name = ( select est_name from received_ref t1 join establishment t2 on t1.use_id = t2.est_id where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId} and category = 'E' and active_state = 1) ;
select count(*) as count, approval_order from approval where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId} and org_user_id = #{orgUserId};
select doc_status from approval_doc where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId};
select org_user_id from approval_doc where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId};
mapper.update: update approval_doc set doc_del_status = 1 where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId};
mapper.select: select org_user_id, approval_status, approval_order from approval where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId};
select org_user_id from approval where approval_doc_id = #{approvalDocId} and approval_order = #{approvalOrder} + 1;
